main.name: Muskan
main.bio: Hi there! I am Muskan, and I am a fourth-year student at VIT Bhopal University currently interning at GE as an erp sop intern.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Working with different erp, cleaning up the data, convert to different leading erp and sops, to find any leverage oppoptunity based on master data

testimonials.user: This is a website for donation purposes. This can be used for health-care donations, educational donations, etc. Online donation web application plays an important role, since we can reach out to a lot of people for help without third party involvement.

testimonials.text: FACE MASK DETECTOR & TEMPERATURE SENSOR (Aug 21 – Nov 21)
testimonials.user: An IoT based project detects whether a person is wearing a mask or not.
